--- In rest-discuss@yahoogroups.com, "mike amundsen" <mamund@...> 
wrote:
>=
 Reading your example reference document leads me to understand that
> "app=
lication neutral" is to be applied to data and to the data 
model. Is
> tha=
t correct?

"Application neutral" is to be applied to all aspects of an int=
erface. 
All aspects should be as neutral as possible (but not too neutral)=
, 
not JUST the data and the data model.

My accounting example simply emph=
asized the data model aspect.

-- Nick
